title: Creating ranked team
body:
Creating a ranked team only aiming for Silver/Gold level of play. Need to be able to play to at least 11 PM WA time. 
If responding, post rank, days and time available also the rank and age. 
Rank doesn't matter that much not going to be super serious just to play team ranked regularly and improve. 
Need Voice coms either Skype Or ts.

replies.body: Sethane I was b1 but my mates say I should have been high silver but I didn't play ranked much s4. Time is an issue, I work early so I can't stay up late, other then that happy too join and help the team :D If you can find someone else with a better time frame that is fine but by the looks of it your not getting much notice on the boards :p In any case happy rifting :D Also I use Skype.

well me and my freind are both bronzes because of teams all bronzes say that i know but a lot of people have said to us why are we smurfing we are to really good freinds which means we are really good bot lane together i had a good start to this season as me and him were duoing we also being bronze were only getting matched against silver 4 to silver 1 ty.
